mapper.insert: insert into order (orderNum,customerEmail,itemNum,deliverNum,cartNum, itemQty,orderState,payment,deliverCost,orderDate,usePoint, itemColor,itemSize) values (#{orderNum}, #{customerEmail}, #{itemNum}, #{deliverNum}, #{cartNum}, #{itemQty}, #{orderState}, #{payment}, #{deliverCost}, sysdate, #{usePoint}, #{itemColor}, #{itemSize})
